text: Welcome back! Pete Davidson returned to Instagram on Wednesday, November 28, nearly two months after calling off his engagement to Ariana Grande. “ See you at sundance muthaf — kas, ” Davidson 25, wrote alongside photos of himself with costars in his upcoming film, Big Time Adolescence. The Saturday Night Live comedian made headlines in October for wiping his Instagram account clean days after he and Grande, 25, ended their four - month engagement, according to Daily Mail. Davidson previously deleted his page in July, telling fans via his Story that there wasn ’ t anything “ cryptic ” about his decision, he just didn ’ t “ want to be on Instagram anymore. or on any social media platform. ” However, the Set It Up star returned to Instagram two months later with
